mapper.select: SELECT n.id,n.keywords,n.author,n.title,n.source,n.abstract,n.content,n.create_time,n.publish_time,n.update_time, nt.type_id ,nt.type_name,u.user_id,u.username FROM news n LEFT JOIN news_type nt ON n.news_type=nt.type_id LEFT JOIN users u ON n.user_id=u.user_id WHERE n.user_id=#{userId} limit #{startIndex}, #{pageSize}

SELECT n.id,n.keywords,n.author,n.title,n.source,n.content,n.abstract,n.create_time,n.publish_time,n.update_time, nt.type_id ,nt.type_name,u.user_id,u.username,n.small_img_url FROM news n LEFT JOIN news_type nt ON n.news_type=nt.type_id LEFT JOIN users u ON n.user_id=u.user_id WHERE n.id=#{newsId}
mapper.update: update news set small_img_url=#{imgUrl} where id=#{newsId}
update news_type set type_name=#{typeName} where type_id=#{typeId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from news where news_type=#{typeId}
mapper.delete: delete from news where title is null and content is null and keywords is null
